import React from 'react'; import "./Blog.css"; import { Container, Row, Col, Table } from "react-bootstrap"; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import DocumentMeta from "react-document-meta"; function DifferenceMbbsInRussiaVSUkraine() { const meta = { title: "Difference of Studying MBBS in Russia Vs Ukraine for Indian Students", description: "Difference of Studying MBBS in Russia Vs Ukraine for Indian Students by Medical Universities, Cost of Education, Advantage of Countries, Cost Living, PG after MBBS & Scope of Abroad MBBS in India", canonical: "https://www.mbbsadmissionsinabroad.com/difference-of-studying-mbbs-in-russia-vs-ukraine-for-indian-students", meta: { charset: "utf-8", name: { keywords: "Difference of Studying MBBS in Russia Vs Ukraine for Indian Students", }, }, }; return (

Difference of Studying MBBS in Russia Vs Ukraine for Indian Students

  • Differentiate between Universities
  • Cost of Education
  • Advantage for Indian Students
  • Cost of Living
  • PG in Russia vs Ukraine
  • Scope After MBBS in Russia or Ukraine
  • Studying MBBS in Russia or Ukraine is Worth it or Not
  • Conclusion

MBBS is an extremely valued degree across the world and it is totally worth to study MBBS in abroad with top MCI approved medical universities with affordable fee structure in different countries. Ukraine and Russia are the top destinations to study MBBS abroad. Indian students that wish to study MBBS in Russia or MBBS in Ukraine can take a look at the detailed analysis of studying MBBS in both the countries and choose for themselves the most viable option.

{/* */}

Differentiate between Universities

MBBS in Russia medical universities

Studying MBBS in Russia is a good option for Indian medical students because Russia is the 8th top study destination where students wish to study MBBS in Russia. All Russia medical universities are recognized by MCI, WHO, European Council. After completion of MBBS in Russia, the degree awarded to students is M.D (Physician) which is equivalent to MBBS in India.

Russian medical universities become a global educational hub to pursue MBBS course. Indian students that clear MBBS from Russia are eligible for the MCI screening test in India. There are around 57 medical universities in Russia. The student to teacher ratio in all Russian Medical Universities is 7:1. The medium of coaching MBBS is English as well as Russia in Russia medical universities.

MBBS in Ukraine medical universities

Ukraine is gaining a lot of popularity among Indian students who wish to study MBBS from abroad. Ukraine consists of various world-class Government Medical Universities that provide MBBS, MD, and other degrees in medicine at a very affordable fee. The students who complete MBBS in Ukraineare eligible to apply for a job in any part of the world.

The students do not need to give any entrance test to take admission in Ukraine Medical University. All the Ukraine medical universities are accredited by the world’s major organizations such as WHO and UNESCO. The Medical Education in Ukraine is globally accepted and has affordable tuition fee and a world-class education system.

Cost of Education

The cost of education of MBBS in Russia vs Ukraine is as follows:

Country Fee structure per year
Russia $4000 to $11000
Ukraine $5000

Advantage for Indian Students

Advantages for Indian students to study MBBS in Russia:

  • A medical program in Russian Medical Universities is recognized worldwide.
  • The students also trained for MCI (Medical Council of India) screening so that the students can easily attain registration to practice medicine in India.
  • There is no requirement to pay a donation or capitation fee.
  • The fee structure in Russian Medical Universities is reasonable.
  • There is no need of entrance test for pursuing MBBS in Russian Medical Universities
  • All faculty members are internationally acclaimed.
  • The Indian students will also get to experience the knowledge and the understanding of different cultures and traditions followed by the Russians.
  • The medical degrees awarded to students are recognized by WHO, UNESCO, and the MCI. It provides a great benefit to them to work practically anywhere in the world.
  • Each MCI approved Russian Medical Universities provide hostels to the Indian students for accommodation with Indian food.
  • Advanced teaching techniques with outstanding facilities equipped with great state-of-the-art infrastructure and advanced laboratories.

Advantages for Indian students to study MBBS in Ukraine

  • The Ministry of Education and Science of Ukraine manages each Ukraine medical universities. These medical universities provide the best value for medical education for students from around the world in terms of quality, infrastructure and cost.
  • No requirement of donation for getting admission in Ukraine medical college.
  • The students are encouraged to take part in several seminars and international conferences, and other scientific projects in several international universities.
  • Ukraine medical universities of are recognized by WHO, UNESCO, MCI and medical councils of many other counties and provide high quality facilities to the students..
  • The medium of instruction in Ukraine is English which makes it much easier for international students to adapt to the environment.
  • The cost of accommodation is very low as compared to other countries.
  • Indian students who complete MBBS from Ukraine Medical University can easily get a job in India as the MBBS degree acquired from a Ukraine University is recognized by the MCI.
Cost of Living

Cost of living in Russia

Russia provides affordable accommodation and well structured curriculum for Medical Students. Various Russian medical universities provide hostel facilities to the students. The students who do not want to stay in a hostel can select some other facility like lodges, inns, homestay, or so. The students can also go for lodging or off grounds staying. The cost of the inn convenience starts from around $30 to $100 per month but if they choose off-grounds staying is a little bit expensive that ranges from $150 to $400 per month and depends upon the area.

Cost of living in Ukraine

The cost of living in Ukraine is low with a healthy environment as compared to many other countries. Ukraine is a beautiful place and has a study environment that boosts the students in their career. During the MBBS in Ukraine, the students get wonderful accommodation facilities such as there are hostels for Indian students in every university that provide all the essential facilities and amenities with Indian food. The hostel fees for university accommodations vary but it is very reasonable.

PG in Russia vs Ukraine

Following are the PG options after completing MBBS in Russia:

  • The students can opt for many options to pursue their PG courses after completing MBBS from Russian medical universities. They can choose to do PG in Russia followed by the MBBS.
  • They need to clear the MCI screening test and then they can choose any Indian medical colleges for pursuing PG course.
  • There are also PG course options in abroad which students can opt too but they need to clear the respective screening tests of the countries they want.

Following are the PG options after completing MBBS in Ukraine:

  • The students can opt from options such as doing PG or starting a career right away as a surgeon or anything else as the MBBS degree from recognized Ukraine universities has worldwide recognition.
  • The students can choose to do PG anywhere. They can choose to do PG in India, Ukraine or any other country. The students need to clear the respective entrance exam or screening test of that country to pursue PG in any country.
Scope After MBBS in Russia or Ukraine

Scope after MBBS in Russia

  • The students can stay in Russia and practice MBBS
  • They can do PG in Abroad
  • They can prepare for USMLE (USA)
  • They can prepare for PLAB
  • They can return back to India, qualify MCI screening test and practice as MBBS

Scope after MBBS in Ukraine

  • The students can do masters in Medicine
  • They can do personal practice returning to India but after qualify MCI screening test
  • They can join any hospital in any country as the MBBS degree is valid all around the world
Studying MBBS in Russia or Ukraine is Worth it or Not

Russia is one of the best destinations for all aspiring students to pursue MBBS because it offers the best facilities for every medical student. The tuition fee of Russian Medical Universities is comparatively lower than the private medical colleges of India. The medium of instruction in Russia is now English which has made the country a popular place for higher education among Indian students. About 10,000 foreign students are taking Admission in Russian Medical Universities every year.

Ukraine is one of the most preferable destinations for the students who want to study MBBS in abroad. It comprises several top-class above-mentioned MBBS colleges that provide MBBS, MD, and other degrees in medicine at reasonable fees. The medium of instruction in top university for MBBS in Ukraine is English and provides high-quality facilities to the students.

Conclusion

We have provided detailed information regarding MBBS in Russia and MBBS in Ukraine. The students can choose any country as per their interest and budget. Both countries provide high-quality education at reasonable fees. After completing MBBS in Russia and MBBS in Ukraine, the students can have lots of career opportunities.

Dr Vinit Kumar is a Educational Consultant for India & Abroad with more than 18 Years of Experience. He has an extensive background guiding & assisting medical students to find the best university as per their budget. ✔3500+ Students ✔15 Countries ✔MBBS, MBA, PG, UG ✔100% Commitment ✔Education Loan ✔Job Placements
) } export default DifferenceMbbsInRussiaVSUkraine;
